I got into a rhythm in the second half, said Allen Iverson , who finished 14-for-20 from the field and added eight assists.`` The basket looked like an ocean; I was throwing rocks in. It feels good when you catch a rhythm like that.''

At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. practice yesterday. NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said.`` He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations.'' Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

There were so many lessons to be learned, from him http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_48pts_vs_Michael_Redd_the_Bucks_04/05_NBA Allen Iverson looked like he might be on his way to another career game when he put up 45 points in the first three quarters against his favorite foils, the Milwaukee Bucks. After a quiet fourth quarter, Allen Iverson settled for 48 points and leading Philadelphia to a 118-111 victory Tuesday night over the Bucks, who have been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star.`` Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up, Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will.`` Except in the last quarter. I guess they felt like they had to do something.'' By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson
